description.value: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes a care plan type. Any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'Care Plan Type' subset with subset original id 6061000000139; the corresponding SNOMED CT UK Refset fully specified name is 'Care plan type simple reference set (foundation metadata concept)' with Refset Id 999001471000000108.

copyright.value: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.
